q: '' Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Michael Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson . Michael Jordan 's move worked: Jrue Holiday had 15 points, seven rebounds and six assists. He just put us in a good rhythm tonight and had us flowing, Allen Iverson said. Elton Brand , who was previously benched in some fourth quarters, said it was hard to complain about his role after a victory. `` There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there,'' Aaron Rodgers said to wild applause. David Letterman asked Aaron Rodgers why he was not recruited out of high school to a major college. I think a number of reasons: one, I wasn't, you know- even today, I'm not gon na be the guy who pops out as- you know, I'm not 6-5, I'm not 240, I don't run a 4.5 40. But I think a lot of times, the things you can't measure are often the things that give people the most success, Aaron Rodgers said. Jay Gruden hasn't received any overriding direction from Marvin Lewis on how to run the offense.`` He's the head coach, so whatever vision he has is my vision,'' Jay Gruden said. If he has a vision of running the ball 30 times, then that's going to be the vision. We'll do the best we can to appease him. But there's been no vision that's been told to me right now. It's just come on in here, install your offense and let's make a change. -- Joe Kay Eagles promote two defensive coaches PHILADELPHIA( AP)- The Philadelphia Eagles have promoted Mike Munchak Caldwell to linebackers coach and Michael Vick Zordich to secondary/safeties coach. Pensive Simon Cowell - who won an Emmy award in November for`` reshaping television''- admitted: It's impossible to predict the size of the audience.`` The most important thing is, you've got to make a show which is different to what your competitors are doing.`` It has to be well made, it has to be controversial and interesting. If the US show has some of the same qualities as what we have done in the UK, then I think it could do really, really well. But the important thing is- don't take anything for granted. On his Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed. `` I believe Larry is ready'' to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts.`` It's time for him to have a shot at running this.''
